metadata.name: The Age of AI by LAYLAY #1/9
metadata.description:
The time has come when AI has greatly affected human life.

<About the artist>
 LAYLAY finds inspiration for his work from the earnest wishes he has imagined in his life and portrays them as a digital art with the concept of "heroes with minor superpowers."
 Through ingenious superpowers inside ordinary lives, an artist's desire is to convey hope to as many people as possible.
